provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Passenger Transport (Corporate
Area) (Public Utilities) Order, 1948.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. Every service for the transport of passenger or of goods or of
passengers and goods operating in the Corporate Area of Kingston and
St. Andrew as defined in the Kingston and St. Andrew Corporation Act,
pursuant to a road licence under the Road Traffic Act is hereby
declared to be a public utility for the purposes of the Act
              m e inclusion of this page is authorized by L.N. 11211978)
